INSERT INTO compliance_policies_procedures (policy_id, policy_name, policy_description, policy_owner, creation_date) VALUES (1, 'Data Protection Policy', 'This policy outlines the procedures for protecting sensitive data.', 'John Doe', '2022-01-01 09:00:00')

INSERT INTO compliance_policies_procedures (policy_id, policy_name, policy_description, policy_owner, creation_date) VALUES (2, 'Access Control Policy', 'This policy defines rules for managing access to critical systems.', 'Jane Smith', '2022-01-02 10:00:00')

INSERT INTO compliance_policies_procedures (policy_id, policy_name, policy_description, policy_owner, creation_date) VALUES (3, 'Incident Response Plan', 'This plan guides the response to security incidents.', 'Alice Johnson', '2022-01-03 11:00:00')

INSERT INTO compliance_policies_procedures (policy_id, policy_name, policy_description, policy_owner, creation_date) VALUES (4, 'Network Security Policy', 'This policy lays out protocols for securing network infrastructure.', 'Bob Wilson', '2022-01-04 12:00:00')

INSERT INTO compliance_policies_procedures (policy_id, policy_name, policy_description, policy_owner, creation_date) VALUES (5, 'Risk Management Framework', 'This framework outlines risk assessment and mitigation strategies.', 'David Brown', '2022-01-05 13:00:00')

INSERT INTO compliance_policies_procedures (policy_id, policy_name, policy_description, policy_owner, creation_date) VALUES (6, 'Physical Security Policy', 'This policy covers measures to secure physical premises.', 'Sarah Miller', '2022-01-06 14:00:00')

INSERT INTO compliance_policies_procedures (policy_id, policy_name, policy_description, policy_owner, creation_date) VALUES (7, 'Business Continuity Plan', 'This plan ensures continuity of operations during disruptions.', 'Michael Taylor', '2022-01-07 15:00:00')

INSERT INTO compliance_policies_procedures (policy_id, policy_name, policy_description, policy_owner, creation_date) VALUES (8, 'IT Asset Management Policy', 'This policy governs the management of IT assets throughout their lifecycle.', 'Emma White', '2022-01-08 16:00:00')

INSERT INTO compliance_policies_procedures (policy_id, policy_name, policy_description, policy_owner, creation_date) VALUES (9, 'Privacy Policy', 'This policy details the handling of personal data in compliance with regulations.', 'Steven Green', '2022-01-09 17:00:00')

INSERT INTO compliance_policies_procedures (policy_id, policy_name, policy_description, policy_owner, creation_date) VALUES (10, 'Security Awareness Training Policy', 'This policy mandates security awareness training for all employees.', 'Olivia Anderson', '2022-01-10 18:00:00')

INSERT INTO compliance_policies_procedures (policy_id, policy_name, policy_description, policy_owner, creation_date) VALUES (11, 'Vendor Management Policy', 'This policy defines procedures for managing third-party vendors.', 'Thomas Lee', '2022-01-11 19:00:00')

INSERT INTO compliance_policies_procedures (policy_id, policy_name, policy_description, policy_owner, creation_date) VALUES (14, 'Disaster Recovery Plan', 'This plan outlines procedures for recovering from disasters and disruptions.', 'Sophia Martinez', '2022-01-14 22:00:00')
